title: just a good dose of dat matchmaking magic..
body: i know its just normals but im not even close to plat in skill level this system is broke yo. and yeah we got destroyed so the rest of the team wasnt secretly faker either..

replies.body: nah dont tell anyone but secretly i suck, just duo with my gf so she can carry my ass as support =P

Yeah I often check up on players I've matched up against and been destroyed by. No surprise there's a lot of diamond/plat/gold in there.
It would be great if they had a normal game mode that capped the rank.
Unranked vs unranked only, bronze v bronze only etc etc.
I know there's a heap of smurf accounts and boosted animals that could still play, but I don't think it would be as many as an 'open game' in norms as it currently sits.
Plus I don't see why people would bother logging into their smurf just to play a matched norms game to win, without advancing that smurf account. Whats the point of having the ranked smurf account if you're not going to advance it?
Most plat 5 players are boosted anyway lol.
